title: | Video | Shahid Kapoor: Media troubles my wife Mira, but she can handle it well | Popular Now Videos | - India Today
text:
Feedback 
Shahid Kapoor was in the capital to promote his upcoming film Rangoon. The actor will be seen with Kangana Ranaut and Saif Ali Khan on the big screen for the first time in this Vishal Bharadwaj film. In an exclusive interview to IndiaToday.in, Shahid spoke about his Rangoon character, Jamadar Nawad Malik of the British Indian Army, working with Saif Ali Khan and Kangana Ranaut among other things. The Udta Punjab star spoke about how his wife Mira Rajput has gotten around to handling the media these days and does not mind the constant paparazzi-attention. Watch Right Now
